text: 100px There were 8 triathlon events at the 2010 South American Games. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== ===Medalists=== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=4 | Men's events |- |Men's individual sprint |Jorge Luciano Farias '''' |Henrique Siqueira '''' |Oscar David Bohorques '''' |- |Men's team sprint |Oscar David Bohorques Hernan Dario Valero Ricardo Jose Restrepo '''' |Jorge Luciano Farias Lautaro Sebriano Gonzalo Tellechea '''' |Gabriel Jose Rojas Alberto Urdaneta Carlos Enrique Perez '''' |- |Men's individual olympic distance |Diogo Martins '''' |Jorge Eduardo Suarez '''' |Oscar David Bohorques '''' |- |Men's team olympic distance |Jorge Eduardo Suarez Oscar David Bohorques Hernan Dario Valero '''' |Gonzalo Tellechea Jorge Luciano Farias Luciano Franco Taccone '''' |Diogo Martins Henrique Sigueira Bruno Matheus '''' |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=4 | Women's events |- |Women's individual sprint |Barbara Catalina Diaz '''' |Maria Carmenza Rendon '''' |Elizabeth Maria Iniguez '''' |- |Women's team sprint |Maria Carmenza Rendon Carolina Grimaldo Jimenez Mayra Alejandra Vallejo '''' |Elizabeth Maria Iniguez Diana Maria Montes Karina Gabriela Duenas '''' |Barbara Catalina Diaz Favia Alejandra Fuentes Pamela Veron de Lecco '''' |- |Women's individual olympic distance |Barbara Catalina Diaz '''' |Maria Carmenza Rendon '''' |Carolina Grimaldo Jimenez '''' |- |Women's team olympic distance |Maria Carmenza Rendon Carolina Grimaldo Jimenez Mayra Alejandra Vallejo '''' |Barbara Catalina Diaz Andrea Nicole Contreras Favia Alejandra Fuentes '''' |Elizabeth Maria Iniguez Diana Maria Montes Karina Gabriela Duenas '''' |- |} ==References== *Medallists Triathlon South American Games Category:Qualification tournaments for the 2011 Pan American Games 2010
title: Triathlon at the 2010 South American Games
